member.name: T:Kingo.ExceptionMessages
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.AsyncMethodOperationStackTrace_IndexOutOfRange
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There is no element at index '{0}' (Count = {1})..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.EndpointAttribute_InvalidMessageKindSpecified
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid MessageKind ({0}) specified. Endpoints only support commands and events..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MessageHandlerClass_CouldNotResolveMessageHandler
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not resolve message handler of type '{0}'..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MessageHandlerOrQueryInterface_InterfaceMethodNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not find implementation of method '{0}.{1}(...)' on type '{3}'..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MicroProcessorBuilder_InvalidProcessorType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Type '{0}' cannot be used as a MicroProcessor. Please provider a non-abstract, non-generic MicroProcessor-type..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MicroProcessorComponent_InvalidComponentLifetime
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not add component of type '{0}' to the service collection because it is configured with an unsupported lifetime ({1}) for this type..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MicroProcessorComponent_TypeNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot use instance of type '{0}' as a MicroProcessorComponent. Only non-abstract classes without generic parameters are supported..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MicroServiceBus_CircularDependencyDetected
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot publish the specified event(s) inside the constructor of a type that is registered as a '{0}'-type, because this causes a circular reference..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.StoreAndForwardQueueResolver_CannotFindConstructor
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot resolve queue of type '{0}' because the resolver cannot find the appropriate constructor. Please make sure this type declares exactly one public constructor..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.StoreAndForwardQueueResolver_CircularDependencyDetected
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot resolve queue of type '{0}' because a circular dependency was detected in the pipeline..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.UnitOfWork_EnlistmentTimeout
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The operation to enlist to the current unit of work (as a result of modification of aggregate of type '{0}'), was aborted because execution time exceeded the specified timeout ({1})..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.UnitOfWork_InvalidMode
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified mode is invalid: {0}..

member.name: M:Kingo.MicroServices.Controllers.MicroProcessorComponentCollection.AddComponents(System.Func{Kingo.MicroServices.MicroProcessorComponent,Kingo.MicroServices.MicroProcessorComponent})
member.summary: Adds a number of components by looking through the search set and selecting/adding a sub-set of these components to this collection.

Delegate that is used to filter and/or create the component to add. If the delegate returns null, that component is ignored (filtered out). Otherwise, the returned component (which can be a different component from the one that is passed into the delegate) is added to this collection.
member.returns: true if the specified was added as a component; otherwise false.

member.name: T:Kingo.MicroServices.Controllers.StoreAndForwardQueue
member.summary: When implemented, represents a queue that is used to temporarily store all messages that are produced by a operation, such that any mutations in the write-store can be persisted within the same transaction as the messages that are produced by the operation. The uses a message pump, which function is controlled by the and functions, to read these messages from the queue in an independent, asynchronous process/thread, which then attempts to forwards all messages to another .

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The to which all messages are to be forwarded.

member.summary: Returns the to which all messages are to be forwarded.

member.summary: Starts the message pump of this queue.
member.param: Token that can be used to abort the operation.
member.exception: The queue has already been disposed.
The message pump has already been started.

member.name: M:Kingo.MicroServices.Controllers.StoreAndForwardQueue.StopAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Stops the message pump of this queue.
member.param: Token that can be used to abort the operation.
member.exception: The queue has already been disposed.

member.summary: Stores all specified in the queue.

member.name: T:Kingo.MicroServices.UnitOfWorkMode
member.summary: Represents a specific mode of the unit of work that a uses to store and flush changes.

member.name: F:Kingo.MicroServices.UnitOfWorkMode.Disabled
member.summary: Indicates that every resource manager is flushed immediately when it enlists itself.

member.name: F:Kingo.MicroServices.UnitOfWorkMode.SingleThreaded
member.summary: Indicates that all enlisted resource managers are flushed one after the other.

member.name: F:Kingo.MicroServices.UnitOfWorkMode.MultiThreaded
member.summary: Indicates that all resource managers will be grouped by their , and different groups may be flushed simultaneously using different threads.

member.name: T:Kingo.MicroServices.UnprocessableEntityException
member.summary: This exception is thrown by a when a command failed to execute because because the operation was illegal. This type semantically maps to HTTP response code 422 (unprocessable entity).
